name: The TOWNSHIP OF SALEM, a Municipal Corporation, Petitioner v. MILLER PENN DEVELOPMENT, LLC, a Pennsylvania Limited Liability Company, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Township of Salem v. Miller Penn Development, LLC

parties: The TOWNSHIP OF SALEM, a Municipal Corporation, Petitioner v. MILLER PENN DEVELOPMENT, LLC, a Pennsylvania Limited Liability Company, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 22nd day of November, 2016, the Cross Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
161 A.3d 791
The TOWNSHIP OF SALEM, a Municipal Corporation, Petitioner v. MILLER PENN DEVELOPMENT, LLC, a Pennsylvania Limited Liability Company, Respondent
